summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of new school management features: student actions menu, transfer/delete dialogs, promotion toggle, permissions management, profile timetable editor, teachers page, calendar page, and profile navigation

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby attributes for DialogContent components
design_issues.details: Console warnings about accessibility - DialogContent components missing proper descriptions for screen readers

passed_tests: Students actions menu opens and displays edit/transfer/delete options
Inline score editing functionality works (edit fields appear, values can be changed, save works)
Transfer student dialog opens and can be closed properly
Delete student dialog opens and can be closed properly
Promotion button disabled/enabled state changes correctly with settings toggle
Settings permissions edit dialog opens with checkboxes and can be closed
Profile timetable editor is visible and properly structured
Teachers page loads successfully with grid layout
Teachers page shows appropriate empty state when no teachers exist
Calendar page loads successfully with status and events sections
Calendar sync button is present (not tested per instructions)
Calendar page shows appropriate empty state when no events exist
Profile header click correctly navigates to settings profile section
Profile section scrolls into view after navigation
All navigation links work correctly between pages
App loads and renders properly across all tested pages

success_percentage.backend: N/A - Frontend only testing as requested

action_item_for_main_agent: Optional: Add aria-describedby attributes to DialogContent components for better accessibility (low priority)
